Package application

Class NTUCampApplication

java.lang.Object
application.NTUCampApplication
public class NTUCampApplication extends Object
Main application to run the NTU Camp Management.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Nurhidayat

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) static SecurityManager
    authenticator
    SecurityManager variable "authenticator" to handle user logins and change password methods
    (package private) static ArrayList<Camp>
    campList
    ArrayList variable storing camps of NTU
    (package private) static MenuStates
    menu
    MenuStates variable "menu" to tell the programme which state of the menu it is in
    (package private) static MenuStates
    prevMenu
    MenuStates variable "prevMenu" to store last visited menu so there is a way to go back to previous menu
    (package private) static Scanner
    scan
    Scanner variable "scan" to receive user input.
    (package private) static User
    user
    User variable "user" to indicate the current logged in user
    (package private) static UserManager
    userManager
    UserManager variable "userManager" to handle users within the school

    (package private) static void
    viewCampsMenu()
    This menu is a camp menu that is shared throughout the 3 roles STUDENT and COMMITTEE MEMBER are rather similar, the difference would be the option to sign up as Committee Member STAFF will print detailed information of all camps in the NTU Application

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main Function for NTU Camp Application
      Parameters:
      args - Default main method

    • setMenuState

      static void setMenuState(MenuStates newState)
      This method changes the current menu state to the desired menu state according to user choice. Also, it will store the previous menu state in variable "prevMenu"
      Parameters:
      newState - ; Next menu the programme will display

    • errorChoice

      static void errorChoice()
      This method is called whenever user chooses an integer outside of the scope of menu number

    • initialise

      static void initialise()
      This method activates all the variable required to run the programme

    • demo

      static void demo()
      This function was created for the sole purpose of creating camps and have students join ahead of time for demo. Just like a script! Kinda..

    • preLogInMenu

      static void preLogInMenu()
      The first menu that user is greeted by to choose to log in or exit programme

    • logInMenu

      static void logInMenu()
      This is the log in menu that will require User to log in. "authenticator" variable will be called to verify if user exists in the "userManager" variable.

    • preLogOutMenu

      static void preLogOutMenu()
      This menu requires user to confirm his choice to log out

    • logOutMenu

      static void logOutMenu()
      This method just prints out log out confirmation and sets menu to PRELOG_IN

    • viewProfileMenu

      static void viewProfileMenu()
      This menu prints out the main details of the user and has an option to change password

    • viewCampsMenu

      static void viewCampsMenu()
      This menu is a camp menu that is shared throughout the 3 roles STUDENT and COMMITTEE MEMBER are rather similar, the difference would be the option to sign up as Committee Member STAFF will print detailed information of all camps in the NTU Application
      See Also:
      • class for methods implemented here
      • class for methods implemented here

    • viewCampDetailsMenu

      static void viewCampDetailsMenu()
      This menu prints every detail in a camp that Committee Member or Staff is in For Student, it will print the camps they have joined
      See Also:
      • Student for getRegisteredFor() method
      • Details for detailedPrint() method

    • viewEnquiriesMenu

      static void viewEnquiriesMenu()
      This menu handles all kind of enquiry options for all 3 classes
      See Also:
      • class to refer implementation, Student can create and edit enquiry
      • class to refer implementation, Committee Member can create, edit and reply enquiry
      • class to refer implementation, Staff can reply enquiry
